summary: Support Awais and upgrade the infrastructure for the scanning tool.
Duplicate AutoSPF staging server / move to production for DMARC
description:
The dmarc team needs an SPF flattener. I do not want to use the autospf.email domain when giving essentially "free" spf services to the DMARC customers.

Goal is to duplicate staging from autospf and then promote to production.

we can use `spfinclude.com`	 which is hosted at cloudflare and should not be a significant lift to get it working.

the API key is shared here

<https://share.1password.com/s#bEl01lsHrhpSHlkIA7yPDbzVJEf7z9LMSmb4X4-tEfg>

In the feedback ticket, it was mentioned  (point 11) that we should integrate Google Postmaster Tools, but there were no details about that, and I feel this is a big task; therefore, I created this separate ticket for it.
Please add information about this feature. Thanks

**Update 17-04-2025**
@vasile before I work on integrating Postmaster Tool into the DmarcReport application, I have some questions.

1. Should a user be able to create multiple postmaster accounts?

No, we will have only one account for the ADMIN and multiple connected 

2. As a user has many accounts/teams, should postmaster account(s) be associated with user teams or the user itself?
Only Admin can see that, no sharing in teams. 

3. If postmaster accounts are associated with user teams, then should there be permissions created/granted for team invitee to handle/integrate postmaster account(s)?
Not relevant for now. ( NO) 

4. Will there be any association between users' domains in DmarcReport and domains coming from Postmaster?

No, it will be completely independent. Thank you 

5. Where will be Postmaster data shown? It will be a separate page somewhat like in InboxIssue, or there will be a separate link for each domain’s Postmaster data in a specific domain page?

yes a separate menu tab with 2 sub menues, 1 Blacklisted IP 2 Delivery Center

summary: Add hosted services in the flow of adding domain
description:
Now we have hosted services, but when a user adds a new domain, he/she has to setup it with txt records and after that he can do the hosted services setup.
In this ticket, we will give the functionality of selecting the configuration type at the time of adding the domain and show the next steps according to that. It will reduce the amount of work user needs to do for using hosted services.
